<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Consecrated Aura](/Feats.aspx?ID=3465) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 25</row>

**Archetype** [Hallowed Necromancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=172)

**Prerequisites**
[Hallowed Necromancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3459)

</column>

---

Your body radiates positive energy, making your very presence disorienting to [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) and encouraging them to move away from you. The effect plays upon the instincts flowing through their bodies from negative energy and can thus affect even [mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) creatures. You gain an aura of positive energy in a 20-foot emanation. Each undead creature that ends its turn in your aura must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or become [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 2 on a critical failure). A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

**Special** Your aura gains the trait of the magical tradition for the spells you used to qualify for Hallowed Necromancer Dedication.
name: Consecrated Aura
